channel.title: Skill requirement bosses?
channel.description:
Hai. in my server i am making bosses for certain stuff. how do i make it so to attack a certain npc u need a certain skill?
eg: Jad you must have 99 str to attack this monster KQ you must have 99 att to "" ""[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 30 March 2008, 19:56:09[/size][hr]nvm lol im going to bed..

item.title: Skill requirement bosses?
item.dc:creator: @azza123 azza123
item.description:
@azza123 wrote:

Well, it could be something like

public void attackingKQ { if("+playerLevel[0]+" >= 99) { attack = true; } else { sendMessage("You must have 99 attack to attack this monster"); } }
But im not totally sure about how you make things attack each other so dont take my advise 100% hope it helped in someway

Read full topic
